General.Name: Ravinder Heights Limited
General.Description: Ravinder Heights Limited is involved in the real estate business in India. It engages in acquisition, construction, and development of townships, built-up infrastructure, housing, commercial premises, hotels, resorts, hospitals, educational institutions, recreational facilities, and city and regional level infrastructure, as well as rents properties. The company was incorporated in 2019 and is based in New Delhi, India. Ravinder Heights Limited is a subsidiary of Panacea Biotec Limited.
